channel.title: Pkpoints when i die

item.title: Pkpoints when i die
item.dc:creator: @2killsami 2killsami
item.description:
@2killsami wrote:

Hi, on my server when you die by a kqueen or a monster you get pk points

heres my code i only want that u get pkpoints when u kill someone in wildy…

[code] if (!IsInFightCave() && !isInPitGame() && !isInPitRoom() && playerRights != 2 && playerRights != 3 && action != 1 && deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500) {
client killerz = (client) server.playerHandler.players[KillerId];
youdied();
killerz.pkPoints += 2;
killmessage();
}

	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 2399;
		toY = 5171;
		inPitsGame = false;
		PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
		AtkPray = 0;
		StrPrayer = 0;
		DefPray = 0;
		RangePray = 0;
		MagePray = 0;
		PrayHeal = false;
		ProtItem = false;
		ProtMage = false;
		ProtRange = false;
		ProtMelee = false;
		Redemption = false;
		Retribution = false;
		Smite = false;
		Chivalry = false;
		Piety = false;
		isSkulled = false;
		lastSkull = 0;
		headIcon = 0;
		turnpray();
		heightLevel = 0;
		currentHealth = playerLevel[playerHitpoints];
		deathStage = 0;
		resetAnimation();
		frame1();
		prayOn = false;
		AntiTeleDelay = 0;
		EntangleDelay = 0;

headIcon = 0;
skulls = 0;
isSkulled = false;
sM(“Oh dear you have died!”);
resetOtherAtk();
followID = 0;
followID2 = 0;
}

	if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave()) {
		toX = 3092;
		toY = 3492;
		AtkPray = 0;

		EntangleDelay = 0;

isSkulled = false;
headIcon = 0;
skulls = 0;
sM(“Oh dear you have died!”);
resetOtherAtk();
followID = 0;
followID2 = 0;
}
if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && !isInPitGame() && IsInFightCave()) {
